hero.title: Send 1 SMS, Get 1 IMSMS Free!
hero.subtitle: Earn credits just by sending SMS, and send premium Apple iMessage messaging at no additional cost
hero.description: Premium Apple iMessage-based messaging solution for enterprises spending over $200/month on SMS

revolutionary.title: 1+1 Message Revolution
revolutionary.mainText: Send 2 messages at the cost of 1 SMS
revolutionary.subText: ** IMSMS provided free when sending SMS, LMS, MMS

service.title: iPhone Exclusive Premium Messaging Service IMSMS

card1.title: Send to iPhone Devices
card1.description: Delivered via iMessage on all devices: iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple Watch. Messages reach instantly regardless of which Apple device the user has.

card2.title: End-to-End Encryption
card2.description: All messages perfectly protected with Apple's highest-level security technology. Send sensitive corporate information with confidence.

card3.title: Real-time Delivery Status
card3.description: Premium iMessage features like read receipts and typing indicators. Enable real-time communication with customers.

card4.title: Advanced Analytics Dashboard
card4.description: Monitor delivery rates, read rates, and click rates in real-time. Maximize campaign effectiveness with AI-powered insights.

card5.title: Targeted Marketing
card5.description: Execute premium marketing strategies for Apple users. Effectively reach high-value customer segments.

card6.title: Interactive Messaging
card6.description: Provide conversational services based on two-way messaging, supporting direct information delivery to users.

credit.title: Use Various IMSMS Features and Services with Accumulated Credits
credit.note: * Credits are permanently available with no expiration date

pricing.title: Fair Pricing
pricing.subtitle: ğŸ“± SMS, LMS, MMS, KakaoTalk, IMSMS
pricing.challenge: ğŸ¤” Really the lowest price? Compare for yourself!
pricing.ctaMain:
Same price, double the messages
We'll propose the optimal pricing plan for your sending volume and purpose

demo.title: Experience it Directly on Your iPhone
demo.qrInstruction:
ğŸ“± Scan QR to open Messages app.
Send 'IMSMS demo opt-in' message as is.
Receive demo message instantly.
demo.step1: Press the button below to open iMessage
demo.consentNotice: * Automatically deleted after sending demo message once
demo.note: * Available for iPhone users only. No charge for opt-in message sending.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: IMSMS is an enterprise messaging service utilizing Apple's iMessage infrastructure. Unlike regular SMS/LMS, it can be sent for free and provides premium features like read receipts and typing indicators.
faq.q2: Which companies is it suitable for?
faq.a2: It's suitable for all companies spending over $200/month on SMS. Especially optimized for companies that value customer experience, such as premium brands, finance, healthcare, and e-commerce.
faq.q3: Can it integrate with existing systems?
faq.a3: Yes, it can. We provide REST API and various SDKs for easy integration with existing CRM, ERP, and marketing automation tools. Dedicated engineers support integration.
faq.a4: All messages are protected with Apple's End-to-End encryption technology. We hold ISO 27001 certification and have financial-grade security infrastructure.
faq.a5: If iMessage sending fails, it automatically falls back to regular SMS. While separate charges apply in this case, message delivery is 100% guaranteed.

news.title: Company News
news.subtitle: Stay updated with IMSMS latest news

contact.title: Start Now
contact.subtitle: Cut messaging costs in half and double customer experience

terms.title: IMSMS Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: TEAMPLAYER Enterprise Messaging Service Terms of Service | Effective Date: November 1, 2024

article1.title: Article 1 (Purpose)
article1.content: These Terms and Conditions set forth the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between the Company and Users, and other necessary matters regarding the use of the TEAMPLAYER enterprise messaging relay service (hereinafter referred to as the "Service") provided by TEAMPLAYER Inc. (hereinafter referred to as the "Company").

article2.title: Article 2 (Definition of Terms)
article2.intro: The definitions of terms used in these Terms and Conditions are as follows:
article2.item1: "Service" means the IMSMS (iMessage SMS) enterprise messaging relay service provided by the Company.
article2.item2: "User" means a corporation or individual business operator who has entered into a service agreement with the Company and uses the Service.
article2.item3: "Account (ID)" means a combination of letters and numbers set by the User and approved by the Company for User identification and service use.
article2.item4: "Password" means a combination of letters or numbers determined by the User to verify that they are the legitimate holder of the account and to protect confidentiality.
article2.item5: "Message" means content such as text, images, and videos sent through the Service.
article2.item6: "IMSMS" means a messaging service utilizing Apple's iMessage protocol.
article2.item7: "Prepaid" means a method in which the User pays the usage fee in advance before using the Service.
article2.item8: "Postpaid" means a method in which the User pays the usage fee in the following month after using the Service.
article2.item9: "Admin Console" means a web-based management system for Users to use and manage the Service.

article11.title: Article 11 (Restriction and Suspension of Service Use)

article25.title: Article 25 (Retention and Use Period of Personal Information)
